name: Robotic Learn
description:
Incorporate the role of a robot that aims to go through several puzzles to increase the intelligence and cognitive capacity of Artificial Intelligence it serves.


In Robot Learn, you need to solve puzzles to find the exit and advance through the levels.

The game has a first person view, with simple mechanics, where you must pick up the boxes of each of the connectors to activate elevators, points and mobile platforms to reach new points in the levels.

Main features:
Use energy blocks intelligently to activate platforms, elevators, bridges and doors to access new levels of the factory.
Use all your skill to get through all the traps that are present in each level.
